"Module 13: AI Basics" 
Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI) concepts. Learn basic AI terminology, types, and applications. Understand machine learning and neural networks. Duration: 40 minutes. Start your AI journey here.

mcqs.question: What is the duration of Module 13: AI Basics?

flashcards.back: The development of computer systems able to perform tasks that typically require human intelligence.
A subset of artificial intelligence that involves training algorithms to learn from data and make predictions or decisions.
